title: Bug 20113[Workbench] Importing preferences does not trip a Rebuild All when appropriate [general issue]
description: Bug 20113[Workbench] Importing preferences does not trip a Rebuild All when appropriate [general issue] (In my case, using jdk1.4 compliance.)
EB: If importing preferences changes a preference that would cause trip rebuild allif processed manually, then it should cause the same action if changed viaimport preferences.
